displaytitle: The Madonna and Child with a putto
medium: Red chalk heightened with white chalk, on light blue-green laid paper
creditline: Bequest of Dan Fellows Platt, Class of 1895
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and brown ink lower left, recto: antico disegno; composige Corregio; inscribed in graphite, upper right, verso: a27

titles.title: The Madonna and Child with a putto

displaymaker: Bartolomeo Biscaino after Correggio, Italian, 1629 - 1657 | formerly after Correggio, Italian, ca. 1494 - 1534
caption: Bartolomeo Biscaino after Correggio (Italian, 1629 - 1657), formerly after Correggio (Italian, ca. 1494 - 1534), The Madonna and Child with a putto.
